title: Track Awesome Scriptable Updates Daily
_seo_title: Track Awesome Scriptable (dersvenhesse/awesome-scriptable) Updates Daily - Track Awesome List
description: A curated list of awesome Scriptable scripts and widgets.

items.title: Awesome Scriptable Updates on Dec 28, 2024
items.content_text:
### Art

*   [Random-Canvas (⭐2)](https://github.com/RiccStella/Random-Canvas) - Generates random images.
items.content_html:
Art

  • Random-Canvas (⭐2) - Generates random images.

items.title: Awesome Scriptable Updates on Dec 27, 2024
items.content_text: ### Social * [ig-latest-post.js (⭐24)](https://github.com/supermamon/scriptable-instagram-widgets) - The latest post from selected Instagram users. ### Space * [Launch Schedule (⭐3)](https://github.com/rik-rosseel/launch-schedule) - Upcoming space launches and info. ### Tools * [bwh-monitor-widget-for-scriptable (⭐3)](https://github.com/f1tz/bwh-monitor-widget-for-scriptable) - BandWagonHost VPS Monitoring Widget. * [PurpleAir-AQI-Scriptable-Widget (⭐173)](https://github.com/jasonsnell/PurpleAir-AQI-Scriptable-Widget) - Air Quality from PurpleAir sensor.
items.content_html:
Social

  • ig-latest-post.js (⭐24) - The latest post from selected Instagram users.

Space

  • Launch Schedule (⭐3) - Upcoming space launches and info.

Tools

  • bwh-monitor-widget-for-scriptable (⭐3) - BandWagonHost VPS Monitoring Widget.

  • PurpleAir-AQI-Scriptable-Widget (⭐173) - Air Quality from PurpleAir sensor.

Tools

  • github-contributions (⭐22) - GitHub contributions heatmap on your lockscreen.

items.title: Awesome Scriptable Updates on Dec 28, 2023
items.content_text: ### Cars * [FordPassWidget (⭐16)](https://github.com/dschablowsky/FordPassWidget) - Information about your Ford, like location or mileage. * [TeslaData-Widget (⭐65)](https://github.com/DrieStone/TeslaData-Widget) - Information about your Tesla, like charging status and doors locked/unlocked. ### Finance * [btc-usd-course.js (⭐7)](https://github.com/wickenico/btc-usd-course.js) - Shows the current bitcoin course in USD. ### Mobile * [scriptable\_premiumsim (⭐23)](https://github.com/BergenSoft/scriptable_premiumsim) - Data consumption based on tariff for Drillisch providers (e.g. WinSIM, PremiumSIM). ### Reading * [scriptable-pocket-widget (⭐13)](https://github.com/brianseidman/scriptable-pocket-widget) - Shows unread or favorited Pocket articles. ### Social * [conversable-for-scriptable (⭐194)](https://github.com/andyngo/conversable-for-scriptable) - Contact icons to start conversations. ### Tools * [bamboo-scriptable-widget (⭐0)](https://github.com/Korysam15/bamboo-scriptable-widget) - Status of build plans from Bamboo. * [gitlab-stats-for-scribtable (⭐50)](https://github.com/p0fi/gitlab-stats-for-scribtable) - Statistics from GitLab like the number of assigned merge requests.
items.content_html:
Cars

  • FordPassWidget (⭐16) - Information about your Ford, like location or mileage.

  • TeslaData-Widget (⭐65) - Information about your Tesla, like charging status and doors locked/unlocked.

Finance

  • btc-usd-course.js (⭐7) - Shows the current bitcoin course in USD.

Mobile

  • scriptable_premiumsim (⭐23) - Data consumption based on tariff for Drillisch providers (e.g. WinSIM, PremiumSIM).

Reading

  • scriptable-pocket-widget (⭐13) - Shows unread or favorited Pocket articles.

Social

  • conversable-for-scriptable (⭐194) - Contact icons to start conversations.

Tools

  • bamboo-scriptable-widget (⭐0) - Status of build plans from Bamboo.

  • gitlab-stats-for-scribtable (⭐50) - Statistics from GitLab like the number of assigned merge requests.

items.title: Awesome Scriptable Updates on Jun 06, 2021
items.content_text:
### Gaming

*   [steam-wishlist.js](https://gist.github.com/brenoprata10/10d6bd1c8445a1181b899dd47c715577) - Shows items from a user's Steam wishlist.

### Health

*   [Coronavirus.js](https://gist.github.com/planecore/e7b4c1e5db2dd28b1a023860e831355e) -  Covid-19 cases of a selected country.

### Sports

*   [rsg\_group\_mcfit\_high5\_johnreed\_capacity\_widget.js](https://gist.github.com/masselmello/6d4f4c533b98b2550ee23a7a5e6c6cff) - Capacity of the nearest McFit gym.

### Related / Download helper

*   [Import-Script.js (⭐220)](https://github.com/supermamon/scriptable-scripts/blob/master/Import-Script.js) - Script to download code (i.e., from Pastebin, GitHub) into Scriptable.

### Related / Articles

*   [Create your own iOS widget with JavaScript](https://dev.to/matthri/create-your-own-ios-widget-with-javascript-5a11) - Tutorial on how to create your own widget.
items.content_html:
Gaming

  • steam-wishlist.js - Shows items from a user's Steam wishlist.

Health

  • Coronavirus.js - Covid-19 cases of a selected country.

Sports

  • rsg_group_mcfit_high5_johnreed_capacity_widget.js - Capacity of the nearest McFit gym.

Related / Download helper

  • Import-Script.js (⭐220) - Script to download code (i.e., from Pastebin, GitHub) into Scriptable.

Related / Articles

  • Create your own iOS widget with JavaScript - Tutorial on how to create your own widget.

items.title: Awesome Scriptable Updates on Nov 01, 2020
items.content_text: ### Cars * [ZOE-Widget.js](https://gist.github.com/mountbatt/772e4512089802a2aa2622058dd1ded7) - Information about your Renault Zoe like charging or location. ### Calendar * [countdown.js](https://gist.github.com/flasozzi/ab6222ea15de5113555c32c855e9e326) - Simple countdown to dates. * [daysUntilBirthday (⭐49)](https://github.com/lwitzani/daysUntilBirthday) - List of upcoming birthdays from contacts. ### Health * [incidence.js](https://gist.github.com/kevinkub/46caebfebc7e26be63403a7f0587f664) - Covid-19 incidence data for Germany. ### Mobile * [telekom.js](https://gist.github.com/Sillium/f904fb89444bc8dde12cfc07b8fa8728) - Data consumption based on tariff for Telekom.de. * [VodafoneDE (⭐280)](https://github.com/ThisIsBenny/iOS-Widgets/tree/main/VodafoneDE) - Data consumption based on tariff for Vodafone DE. ### Music * [sonos-nowPlaying.js](https://gist.github.com/marco79cgn/98616fcbb2dfdbd752b33a452208bcc8) - Now playing on Sonos. * [spotify-now-playing.js](https://gist.github.com/marco79cgn/79a6a265d978dc22cc2a12058b24e02b) - Now playing on Spotify. ### Social * [termiWidget.js](https://gist.github.com/spencerwooo/7955aefc4ffa5bc8ae7c83d85d05e7a4) - Terminal-like output of subscriber amount. ### Sports * [fitx-widget.js](https://gist.github.com/DanielStefanK/487175b6f65ede401e37ee4848970176) - Workload of a FitX gym. ### Tools * [mz\_invisible\_widget.js](https://gist.github.com/mzeryck/3a97ccd1e059b3afa3c6666d27a496c9) - Creation of "invisible" backgrounds. * [server-status-widget.js](https://gist.github.com/dioncodes/cd4554d8593814a94925735cbcdea0c8) - Reachability of web servers.
items.content_html:

  • VodafoneDE (⭐280) - Data consumption based on tariff for Vodafone DE.

Music

  • spotify-now-playing.js - Now playing on Spotify.

Social

  • termiWidget.js - Terminal-like output of subscriber amount.

Sports

Tools

  • mz_invisible_widget.js - Creation of "invisible" backgrounds.
  • server-status-widget.js - Reachability of web servers.
